properties.displayName: TI Map IP Entity to CommonSecurityLog - [WC-BASE-M]
properties.description: This query maps any IP indicators of compromise (IOCs) from threat intelligence (TI), by searching for matches in CommonSecurityLog.
properties.query:
let IPRegex = '[0-9]{1,3}\\.[0-9]{1,3}\\.[0-9]{1,3}\\.[0-9]{1,3}';
let dt_lookBack = 1h; // Look back 1 hour for CommonSecurityLog events
let ioc_lookBack = 14d; // Look back 14 days for threat intelligence indicators
// Fetch threat intelligence indicators related to IP addresses
let IP_Indicators = ThreatIntelIndicators
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| distinct TIEntity = ObservableValue
| where isnotempty( TIEntity)
| where ipv4_is_private(TIEntity) == false
and TIEntity !startswith "fe80"
and TIEntity !startswith "::"
and TIEntity !startswith "127.";
// Perform a join between IP indicators and CommonSecurityLog events
IP_Indicators
// Use innerunique to keep performance fast and result set low, as we only need one match to indicate potential malicious activity that needs investigation
| join kind=innerunique (
    CommonSecurityLog
    | union ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
    | extend Risk_ = Description
    | where TimeGenerated >= ago(dt_lookBack)
    | extend MessageIP = extract(IPRegex, 0, Message)
    | extend CS_ipEntity = iff(isnotempty(SourceIP), SourceIP, DestinationIP)
    | extend CS_ipEntity = iff(isempty(CS_ipEntity) and isnotempty(MessageIP), MessageIP, CS_ipEntity)
    | extend CommonSecurityLog_TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated
    | where SimplifiedDeviceAction !contains "deny"//omits blocked connections
    | where SimplifiedDeviceAction !contains "block"//omits blocked connections
    | where DeviceAction !contains "deny"//omits blocked connections
    | where Activity !contains "deny"//omits blocked connections
    | where DeviceAction !endswith "-rst" //omits rst packets common in false positives
    | where SimplifiedDeviceAction !endswith "-rst" //omits rst packets common in false positives
    | where Activity !endswith "-rst" //omits rst packets common in false positives
    | where not(ApplicationProtocol has_any("RIP","NTP") and Activity contains "local" and Risk_ !contains "High risk")
    )
    on $left.TIEntity == $right.CS_ipEntity
// Filter out logs that occurred after the expiration of the corresponding indicator
| where CommonSecurityLog_TimeGenerated < ExpirationDateTime
// Group the results by IndicatorId and CS_ipEntity, and keep the log entry with the latest timestamp
| summarize CommonSecurityLog_TimeGenerated = arg_max(CommonSecurityLog_TimeGenerated, *) by  CS_ipEntity
// Select the desired output fields
| project
    timestamp = CommonSecurityLog_TimeGenerated,
    Computer,
    SourceIP,
    DestinationIP,
    DestinationPort,
    MessageIP,
    Message,
    DeviceVendor,
    DeviceProduct,
    Activity,
    IndicatorId,
    ThreatType,
    ExpirationDateTime,
    ConfidenceScore,
    TIEntity,
    CS_ipEntity,
    LogSeverity,
    DeviceAction,
    Type
| summarize count(), min(timestamp), max(timestamp), make_set(DestinationPort) by Computer, SourceIP, DestinationIP, DeviceProduct, ThreatType, CS_ipEntity, DeviceAction, Activity//to make data easily digestible
| where DeviceAction contains "accept" and Activity != "traffic:local accept" // Ticket ID 2604998
